title: Low Earth orbit satellite cluster to provide secure digital military intelligence from 2024
summary: BAE Systems is partnering with ICEYE to integrate ICEYE's advanced Synthetic Aperture Radar (SAR) technology into the AzaleaTM satellite cluster, a multi-sensor satellite system set to launch in 2024. The partnership aims to deliver high-resolution, real-time intelligence for military and disaster response applications by combining SAR, optical, and RF data processing in orbit.
why_it_matters: This partnership enhances the UK's sovereign space capabilities and strengthens military and humanitarian intelligence gathering by leveraging ICEYE's SAR technology and BAE Systems' expertise. It represents a significant advancement in real-time, space-based data processing and secure intelligence delivery.
